gen:link.msg:message: Instant facts BEHOREN te worden gerapporteerd met instant {$FinancialReportingPeriodPrePrePrePreviousEndDateParam}, {$FinancialReportingPeriodPrePrePreviousEndDateParam}, {$FinancialReportingPeriodPrePreviousEndDateParam}, {$FinancialReportingPeriodPreviousEndDateParam} of {$FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentEndDateParam} en duration facts BEHOREN te worden gerapporteerd met startDate {$FinancialReportingPeriodPrePrePreviousStartDateParam} en endDate {$FinancialReportingPeriodPrePrePreviousEndDateParam}, startDate {$FinancialReportingPeriodPrePreviousStartDateParam} en endDate {$FinancialReportingPeriodPrePreviousEndDateParam}, startDate {$FinancialReportingPeriodPreviousStartDateParam} en endDate {$FinancialReportingPeriodPreviousEndDateParam} of startDate {$FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentStartDateParam} en endDate {$FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentEndDateParam}. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationHealthCare_AllPeriodAspectCondParamPPPPEtCE1_AllItems')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationHealthCare_AllPeriodAspectCondParamPPPPEtCE1_AllItems return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

Instant facts BEHOREN te worden gerapporteerd met instant {$FinancialReportingPeriodPreviousEndDateParam} of {$FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentEndDateParam} en duration facts BEHOREN te worden gerapporteerd met startDate {$FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentStartDateParam} en endDate {$FinancialReportingPeriodCurrentEndDateParam}. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_DocumentInformationHealthCare_AllPeriodAspectCondParamPEtCE1_AllItems')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_DocumentInformationHealthCare_AllPeriodAspectCondParamPEtCE1_AllItems return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
